Activity: Log in, check emails, and prepare for the team meeting.
Present findings on bug tracking tools to the team and lead a discussion on which tool best suits our needs.
Schedule a follow-up meeting for the team to finalize the selection of the bug tracking tool.
Begin drafting templates for bug reports to ensure consistency. Include fields for title, description, steps to reproduce, and expected vs actual results.
Create a document outlining best practices for bug reporting to accompany the templates.
Check emails for any feedback on the templates created.
